CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Such high energy alignment would not enable to achieve a large open - circuit voltage and is eventually detrimental to the PCE output of PT - based PSCs such as in P3HT / PCBM systems with PCE ranging from 3 to 4% .

Let's think step by step.

The "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are:

1. P3HT
2. PCBM
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure, my apologies. The "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are:

1. P3HT
2. PCBM

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here are the valid "Material Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| P3HT |
| PCBM |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Such high energy alignment would not enable to achieve a large open - circuit voltage and is eventually detrimental to the PCE output of PT - based PSCs such as in P3HT / PCBM systems with PCE ranging from 3 to 4% .

Let's think step by step.

The "Property Name" entities in the paragraph are:

1. open-circuit voltage
2. PCE (Photovoltaic Conversion Efficiency)
3. PT (Polymer-based Photovoltaic)
4. P3HT (Poly(3-hexylthiophene))
5. PCBM ([6,6]-phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that clearly refer to Material Property in the given paragraph:

1. open-circuit voltage
2. PCE (Photovoltaic Conversion Efficiency)

These two entities are relevant to the material property of the polymer-based photovoltaic systems being discussed in the paragraph.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's a Markdown table with the valid entities in the "Property Name" column:

| Property Name |
| --- |
| open-circuit voltage |
| PCE (Photovoltaic Conversion Efficiency) |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Such high energy alignment would not enable to achieve a large open - circuit voltage and is eventually detrimental to the PCE output of PT - based PSCs such as in P3HT / PCBM systems with PCE ranging from 3 to 4% .

Let's think step by step.

The "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are:

1. 3%
2. 4%

These are the values of the "PCE" (Power Conversion Efficiency) property of PT-based PSCs (Polymer Solar Cells) systems, specifically the range of PCE values that P3HT/PCBM systems can achieve.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that refer to the value of a material property:

1. 3%
2. 4%

These are the values of the "PCE" (Power Conversion Efficiency) property of PT-based PSCs (Polymer Solar Cells) systems.

Sure, here's a Markdown table with the valid entities presented in the same words as in the original paragraph:
